item.title: Let’s build a house
item.description: When talking about software, we often hear the term “architecture” mentioned a lot. That inevitably reminds us of buildings and construction. While this may be true up to some extent, there are a lot of discrepancies between the approaches we take towards architecting a building (a house for example) and a typical web application software system. Much more so if we employ agile practices while doing so (which I hope we all do).
